dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 11.2 million translations between 15 European source languages and 8 European target languages classified to formal and informal classes according to target sentence formality. It allows for fine-tuning machine translation models to ensure a given formality level for each European target language considered.
dcterms:title: FAME-MT Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sudha Rao
Joel R. Tetreault
dcterms:description: A dataset introducing 110,000 pairs of formal and informal sentences in English, based on Yahoo Answers L6 corpus, proposed for style transfer.
dcterms:title: GYAFC (Grammarly’s Yahoo Answers Formality Corpus)

dcterms:creator: Maria Nadejde
Anna Currey
Benjamin Hsu
Xing Niu
Marcello Federico
Georgiana Dinu
dcterms:description: A dataset providing a set of triples consisting of English sentences translated into formal and informal versions for each of the supported languages, with around 1,000 examples divided into train and test sets.
dcterms:title: CoCoA-MT

dcterms:creator: Thamme Gowda
Zhao Zhang
Chris Mattmann
Jonathan May
dcterms:description: A dataset providing access to many-to-English machine translation tools, data, and pretrained models.
dcterms:title: MTData

dcterms:creator: Eleftheria Briakou
Di Lu
Ke Zhang
Joel R. Tetreault
dcterms:description: A benchmark for multilingual formality style transfer, providing pairs of informal sentences and their formal counterparts in three languages.
dcterms:title: XFORMAL

dcterms:creator: Philipp Koehn
dcterms:description: A parallel corpus for statistical machine translation.
dcterms:title: Europarl

dcterms:creator: Marta Bañón
Pinzhen Chen
Barry Haddow
Kenneth Heafield
Hieu Hoang
Miquel Esplà-Gomis
Mikel L. Forcada
Amir Kamran
Faheem Kirefu
Philipp Koehn
Sergio Ortiz Rojas
Leopoldo Pla Sempere
Gema Ramírez-Sánchez
Elsa Sarrías
Marek Strelec
Brian Thompson
William Waites
Dion Wiggins
Jaume Zaragoza
dcterms:description: A dataset for web-scale acquisition of parallel corpora.
dcterms:title: ParaCrawl
